name: Akula
description:
Akula

Ayo! Akula is an arcade game where you are in the depths of the ocean, under 70 meters from the surface! Your mission is to get out of there but do not rush your way out to the outside, the water pressure may end up killing you! Also, just in case, watch out for the sharks, but there shouldn't be a lot of them. Good luck!

(Zoom for a better experience)

Controls:

A/D: Move Left/Right

Escape: Pause

Game done for the Trijam #161 in 4.25h from scratch (besides the music)

Song: Jeremy Blake - Powerup! 9
